Name: Muhammad ibn Musa al-Khwarizmi
Achievement: "The term 'algorithm' is derived from the algorism
Tags: the technique of performing arithmetic with Hindu-Arabic numerals developed by al-Khwārizmī. Both 'algorithm' and 'algorism' are derived from the Latinized forms of al-Khwārizmī's name

Name: John Vincent Atanasoff
Achievement: "The Atanasoff–Berry computer (ABC) was the first automatic electronic digital computer. The ABC's priority is debated among historians of computer technology
